skills.name: Rolling Punch
skills.description: Throws a punch that ignores the enemy's Defense and weakens the Attack Power for 1 turn with an 80% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%

skill_effect.name: Ignore DEF
skill_effect.description: Attack will ignore the target's defense.

skills.name: One More Drink
skills.description: Recovers the HP of all allies and decreases their chances of being attacked with a critical hit for 2 turns. The recovery amount is proportionate to the Attack Power.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Increase CRI Resist
skill_effect.description: Critical Hit Rate against the monster is reduced by 50%

skills.name: Stork Kick
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 3 times with a swift strike to disturb the enemy's HP recovery for 2 turns with a 75% chance. Recovers the HP of all allies by 25% of the inflicted damage.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns
